Articles.Content:
So I'm making a mobile base for Duna, but so far in testing if I hit so much as a bunch going at about 8m/s the joints between every single segment just shatters.

Edited April 17, 2014 by locustgate
Are you using unbreakable joints or any reinforcement addons?

Are you using unbreakable joints or any reinforcement addons?

No. I think I've fixed it I put a battery in between the 2 living sections and moved the wheels down to near the windows.
Okay, I was trying to reproduce this craft and couldn't get it to break, even when hitting the SPH at 12m/s
Were you trying to move up the edges of the space center area? These things are treacherous little things.

Were you trying to move up the edges of the space center area? These things are treacherous little things.

I hit a slope, then it did it again when I was trying to move along the hanger tracks and going down the ramp....and turning, a wheel hit one of the tracks. BUT moot point, as it hasn't done it in the past 5 trials....Its about time to do a long term test.

Edited April 17, 2014 by locustgate
